Description: Come see this beautiful studio right on Revere Beach. Spacious, sunny, freshly painted in great condition right, on the Ocean! Laundry In-Unit. Garage Parking. HEAT & HOT water included. Central A/C. Elevator building with 24 hr concierge, a heated indoor pool, and fully equipped gym. Cats are permitted with landlord approval. Easy to show and available now. Call for a private showing!
